Gravity Framework

Gravity is a light-weight Inversion-of-Control (IoC) / Dependency-Injection framework.

See:
          Description

Packages
gravity This package contains the core gravity API.
gravity.impl This package implements the default behavior of the gravity framework.
gravity.plugins This package implements the various Registry configuration styles.
gravity.util This package contains utilities used by the gravity framework.

 

Gravity is a light-weight Inversion-of-Control (IoC) / Dependency-Injection framework.
